description: Southeast Asia is many things. Its past includes dinosaurs, ancient kingdoms and devastating wars, while its future is still being shaped. SE1101E explores this fascinating region in all its diversity historical, cultural, economic, aesthetic, political, religious, gendered, environmental, and more. The module focuses on human experiences in Southeast Asia and how Southeast Asians engage with global processes. Lectures cover topics that move between the regionâ€™s murky past to the cyber spaces of a seemingly borderless future. It provides both an insightful introduction to the region and a foundation for future studies.
title: The Lands Below the Winds: Southeast Asia in the World
